anagatha ejapa aanduwaka kabinat amathi sihinayak dakina ashok abesinha mahatha thamange deshapalana bankolothbhawaya wasa ganimata sidu kala mema abhutha chodanawa thaman tharaye prathikshepa karana bawath, ese sidu kala yayi kiyana praharaya sandaha thaman sahabhagi wu bawa oppu kara penwuwahoth thaman kurunagala nagaradhipathi dhurayen illa aswana bawath adala chodanawa sambandhayen kurunagala nagaradhipathi thushara sanjiwa witharana mahatha eeye (04da) dahawal madhya hamuwak kandawamin pawasiya.

amathya mandalaya wisin 2019 pebarawari 12 dina pawathi siya raswimedi eki komishan sabha warthawe nirdesha kriyathmaka kirima sambandhayen thakshanika saha mulya samalochanayak sidu kara nirdesha idiripath kirima pinisa mudal amathyathumage pradhanathwayen yuth amathya mandala anu karaka sabhawak saha eyata sahaya wima sandaha niladhar kamituwak path kara atha. eki kamitu warthawa nuduru dinayakadima amathya mandalaya wetha idiripath kirimata niyamithawa atha.
matath kiyahanko ban oya widihata mayik eka pupuranda kagahala kadulu ganna hati.

ethakotayi, anith aya ee aya geana pahadenne// mama nawathath kiyanne itha asichara lesa apahasa kala ewunta simawa ikmawa prathicharaya dakwuye loka muslim prajawen ithama sulu pirisak kiyana eka obata therum ganna tharam buddiyak naththam, me oba samaga sanwadaye yedana mohothe pawa api ee prachandathwayata ekanga na kiya ma athulu ape sahodarawaru kihipa, dena wisin obata kihipa wathawakma pahadili kirimen pasuwada obata therum ganimata buddiyak naththam, oba thawa kenekge shielacharakama, dharmika bawa, thawa kenekge abhyanthara diyunuwa therum ganne keseda?

shri lanka aarakshaka hamuda niladharinta thamilnaduwe puhunuwa laba nodena bawa indiya aarakshaka amathi ee ke anthani mahatha prakasha karayi.amathyawaraya ema prakashaya kale, thamilnaduwe thanjawur pradeshayedi indiya guwan hamuda kandawure aluthwadiya karana lada guwan pathayak wiwrutha kirime uthsawayakata sahabhagi wemini.mema thinduwa sambandha wadi wisthara amathiwaraya helikale nokaleya.shri lanka hamudawalata puhunuwa laba dimata erehiwa thamilnaduwasin udghoshana pawathwima hamuwe ema puhunuwa nathara kerina.kese namuth shri lanka hamuda niladharin indiyawe anek pranthawala thawaduratath puhunuwa labana athara, aarakshaka amathya anthani mahathage prakashaya indiya aanduwa mita perathuwa ganu labu thinduwak yali awadharanaya kirimaki.indiyawe milanga maha mathiwaranaya pawathwimata niyamithawa thibenne 2014 diya.
